manpage.title: tolower towlower

description.para: The tolower function converts an uppercase letter to the corresponding lowercase letter. For single c character locale the value of the argument is represented as an unsigned character or the value of EOF.

return.para: If the argument is an uppercase letter, the tolower function returns the corresponding lowercase letter if there is one; otherwise the argument is returned unchanged.

remarks.para: If possible and appropriate each of these routines converts a given uppercase letter to a lowercase letter .
